landing.title: Search across the OpenITI corpus in one place.
landing.description: A focused entry point for exploring Arabic and Islamicate texts, authors, places, and eras. Type a keyword, a person, or a title and start mapping the literary record.
landing.helper: Start broad, then filter by region, period, or collection.
landing.examples: Try: Qawacid Fiqhiyya, Ma Hiya Sinima
